unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Dhawan's injury? Heard he pulled a hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match. Really hoping he recovers soon! We need him back in form before the World Cup. Remember that "Lagaan" spirit? Just like Bhuvan, he'll bounce back! Hope NCA physios are on it. Get well soon, paaji! Any updates appreciated. Maybe before Diwali?
normalised: Hey everyone, any news on Dhawan's injury? Heard he pulled a hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match. Really hoping he recovers soon! We need him back in form before the World Cup. Remember that "Lagaan" spirit? Just like Bhuvan, he'll bounce back! Hope N C A physios are on it. Get well soon, paaji! Any updates appreciated. Maybe before Diwali?
